name: The Designlab
description:
Designlab make ideas for Beauty & Fashion Brands.
In just over 15 years they have worked hand in hand with some of the world's top 25 beauty and fashion brands to deliver business success. Designlab explore all channels available, from print to digital or social media to drive their clients and its brand forward.
They have built a reputation for making beautiful and effective ideas for some of the world of fashion and beauty.
